data.eml:eml: A charismatic new species of green lacewing discovered in Malaysia (Neuroptera, Chrysopidae): the confluence of citizen scientist, online image database and cybertaxonomy

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Winterton, Shaun L., Guek, Hock Ping, Brooks, Stephen J. (2012): A charismatic new species of green lacewing discovered in Malaysia (Neuroptera, Chrysopidae): the confluence of citizen scientist, online image database and cybertaxonomy. ZooKeys 214: 1-11, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.214.3220, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.214.3220
